Coded and conventional keys:

a:
    desc:   Author, Artist
    init:   any
    notes:  This is handled specially by some encoders.

c:
    desc:   Character
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value

ch:
    desc:   Chapter
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value

cx:
    desc:   Character-crossover
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value

dan:
    desc:   [Danbooru](https://danbooru.donmai.us/) item.
    init:   number
    short:  value
    long:   ‘https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/’ value
    class:  Danbooru

date:
    desc:   Date
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value
    notes:  This might get a class and parsing in the future.

doi:
    desc:   Document Object Identifier
    accept: TODO
    short:  prefix ‘,’ suffix
    long:   (‘doi:’ prefix ‘/’ suffixᵖ) | uri
    class:  DOI

e:
    desc:   Episode
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value

ean:
    desc:   International Article Number
    accept: ean13 | sbn | isbn | ismn | issn | upc-a
    short:  value
    long:   ‘urn:ean13:’ value

file:
    desc:   Local file path.
    accept: path
    short:  value
    long:   value
    class:  File

gel:
    desc:   [Gelbooru](https://gelbooru.com/) item.
    init:   number
    short:  value
    long:   ‘https://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=post&s=view&id=’ value
    class:  Gelbooru

info:
    desc:   ‘info’ URI
    accept: uri
    short:  uri
    long:   uri
    class:  Info

isbn:
    desc:   International Standard Book Number
    accept: isbn
    short:  isbn
    long:   isbn
    class:  ISBN

ismn:
    desc:   International Standard Music Number
    accept: ismn
    short:  ismn
    long:   ismn
    class:  ISMN

issn:
    desc:   International Standard Serial Number
    accept: issn
    short:  issn
    long:   issn
    class:  ISSN

j:
    desc:   Enclosing work (journal, album, etc.)

lang:
    desc:   Language
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value
    notes:  Might get a class with ISO-639 interpretation in the future.

lccn:
    desc:   Library of Congress Catalog Number
    accept: lccn
    short:  lccn
    long:   lccn
    class:  LCCN

n:
    desc:   Sequence number (track, issue, etc.)
    notes:  Handled specially by some encoders.

p:
    desc:   page(s)

pixiv:
    desc:   [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/) item.
    init:   pixiv
    short:  value
    long:   ‘https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/’ id [‘#’ item]
    class:  Pixiv

sub:
    desc:   Subtitle language
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value
    notes:  Might get a class with ISO-639 interpretation in the future.

t:
    desc:   Timestamp (within a work; for points in time use `date`).
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value
    notes:  This might get a class and parsing in the future.

tcom:
    desc:   Composer
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value
    notes:  Named for the ID3v2 tag.

text:
    desc:   Lyricist
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value
    notes:  Named for the ID3v2 tag.

tweet:
    desc:   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/) post.
    init:   [account ‘,’] post
    short:  value
    long:   url
    class:  Twitter

uri:
    desc:   Universal Resource Identifier
    init:   uri
    short:  uri
    long:   uri
    class:  URI

url:
    desc:   Universal Resource Locator
    init:   url
    short:  url
    long:   url
    class:  URL

urn:
    desc:   Universal Resource Name
    init:
    short:
    long:
    class:  URN

v:
    desc:   Volume (of a multi-volume work)
    init:   any
    short:  value
    long:   value

yt:
    desc:   YouTube video
    init:   youtube id
    short:  value
    long:   ‘https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=’ value
    class:  YouTube
